properties.name: Cafe Noir
properties.description: Posted by Natalielederman  32 Grand St, new york, ny 10013Bee\'s 25th Birthday! Delicious tapas - try the brie with fried grapes.

properties.name: Calvin Tran
properties.description: Posted by Natalielederman 115 Grand St, New York, 10013 Kitten and my accidental great find - up and coming designer with totally mod, totally versatile pieces. Try to go when Calvin\'s there -- he\'s a totaly diva and completely understands women\'s bodies. He\'ll dress you to look and feel spec-ta-cu-lar, and you\'ll love him and his clothes for it.

properties.name: East Side Toy Co. (The Back Room)
properties.description: Posted by Natalielederman102 Norfolk St New York, NY 10002 Malcolm Gladwell spotting! Spaceous hipster speakeasy vibe in east village. Beer in paper bags and cocktails in tea cups.

properties.name: Ghenet Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Natalielederman 284 Mulberry Street, New York, NY, 10012Stephanie\'s awesome suggestion - delicious ethiopean with veggie options. definitely great to go to share, but with a very small group... cozy but small venue.

properties.name: Good Enough to Eat
properties.description: Posted by Natalielederman 483 Amsterdam Ave, New York, 10024 A local dream come true - the most divine comfort food, and delicious breakfast. My girlfriends and I go (too) often, and are all particularly fond of the veggie burger. And we\'re fat kids, and we STILL love the veggie burger. So it must be divine.

properties.name: Heathers
properties.description: Posted by Natalielederman506 E. 13th St., New York, NY 10009New JK\'s favourite bar in the city. At least this week. Total 1930s dive bar elegance. Doors unmarked. Chill, cheap drinks, great hiding spot for great conversation.

properties.name: Palais Royale
properties.description: Posted by Natalielederman173 Mott St, new york, 10013Dark, dingy, gorgeous. Great whiskey (a list of 40 to choose from), great tunes on a jukebox. Very little else necessary. Also right above Double Happiness, another rowdy, dingy speakeasy in town. Yet another good choice by New JK.

properties.name: Sala 19
properties.description: Posted by Natalielederman 35 W 19th St, New York, 10011 Carla\'s recommendation for dinner with friends - cozy, great spanish tapas, good for a small group, nice wine list.

properties.name: The Burger Joint in Le Parker Meridien
properties.description: Posted by Alitaforever  118 W. 57th St., NY, NY

properties.name: bOb's
properties.description: Posted by Natalielederman   235 Eldridge St., New York, NY 10002 Thank you Sho, for bringing me to a cozy brick low-lit bar that turns into a sweatbox dance party. Go to fulfill your late 90s dance movie dreams.
